= Files =

*/usr/bin/tomcat-check.pl*

   The main perl script (daemon).

*/etc/tomcat-check.xml*

   The well formed XML configuration file.

/tmp/tomcat-check-status.xml

   A temporal file to store the output downloaded from Apache Tomcat Manager via HTTP each time a check is performed by the main perl script.
